title: bAlagOpAla pAlayAshu mAm
sahitya:
bAlagOpAla pAlayAshu mAm bhaktavatsala krpA jaladhE hari


anupallavi

 nIla nIrada sharIra dhIratara nIrajakara nirupamAnanda kara 
lIlayA gOpavESa dhara muraLIdhara shrIdhara dAmOdaravara


caraNam   cANUra malla haraNa nipuNatara caraNa nihata shakaTAsura murahara mANikya makuTa hAra valaya 
dhara mattEbha kumbha bhEdana paTutara vANIshArccita pItAmbharadhara vaijayantI vana mAlA dhara 
ANavAdi vijaya mAnasAkara apahata kamsAsura nata bhUsura drON karNa duryOdhanAdi hara draupadI 
mAna samrakSaNakara vaiNika gAyaka guruguha nuta pura vairi vihita gOpikA manOhara
